nodes.text: Orin was an employee of Ohnaka Transport Solutions, a shipping company that operated on the Outer Rim planet Batuu during the war between the First Order and the Resistance. Around 34 ABY, the Ohnaka Transport Solutions supervisor Lee Skillen felt surprised when Orin chose to leave the company. Orin's departure necessitated that other employees of the business, including Delta Jeet, work more time to make up for the unanticipated loss.
Orin was first mentioned in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida Córdova.
